sections.heading: licensed mortgage banker, registrant, and installment loan company shall submit to the Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry mortgage reports of condition, which shall be in such form and shall contain such information as the department may require

sections.text:
45-726.Reports.

Each licensed mortgage banker, registrant, and installment loan company shall submit to the Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry mortgage reports of condition, which shall be in such form and shall contain such information as the department may require.

SourceLaws 2009, LB328, ยง 11;Laws 2010, LB892, ยง 10.
